content: {"locationId": "4736", "organizationId": "3967", "name": "St Mary Magdalen Food Pantry", "address1": "93 Lakeview Avenue", "address2": "", "city": "Tyngsboro", "state": "MA", "zipCode": "01879", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "42.684934", "longitude": "-71.399078", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "St Mary Magdalen food pantry is a monthly distribution pantry providing food support to the area served by the St Mary Magdalen Parish in Tyngsboro MA.  We are staffed by volunteers from the St Vincent de Paul conference and ready to help anyone needing food assistance. We may point clients toward affiliated agencies for further support.", "notes": "Our food pantry distribution is on the second Wednesday of the month. We make appointments for anyone coming to the pantry so it is best to call ahead and we will provide a time slot for you. 978-844-2365.  Entrance is at the rear of the building at 93 Lakeview Ave in Tyngsboro MA.      ", "contactName": "Doris Stauble", "contactPhone": "978-844-2365", "contactEmail": "stvincentsmm@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 33, "regionName": "Merrimack Valley Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1134b54c-59ea-435d-95c7-290215b83d59.png", "website": "https://mvfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["None-None (Call for Information)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
